text: And these were the princes of Solomon; Azariu son of Sadoc the priest, and Orniu son of Nathan chief of the officers, and he 2. 46 Gr. ran.went to his house; and Suba the scribe, and Basa son of Achithalam recorder, and Abi son of Joab commander-in-chief, and Achire son of Edrai was over the 2. 46 Or, tributes.levies, and Ban√¶as son of Jodae over the household and over the brickwork, and Cachur the son of Nathan was counsellor.
